body_html:
@rongjiecomputer I think you are right. Here we also need to distinguish MSVC and clang, as you are working on Clang support for TensorFlow IIRC.

So maybe change it to:

#if defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(__clang__)
#include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/windows/cpu_info.h"
#endif

Then remove the check in third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/windows/cpu_info.h ?
body:
@rongjiecomputer I think you are right. Here we also need to distinguish MSVC and clang, as you are working on Clang support for TensorFlow IIRC.

So maybe change it to:
```
#if defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(__clang__)
#include "third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/windows/cpu_info.h"
#endif
```
Then remove the check in `third_party/tensorflow/core/platform/windows/cpu_info.h` ?
